text:
e="preserve">Marilyn Stoughton Lewis (July 19, 1931 – December 7, 2020) was an American politician. She was a Republican member of the Pennsylvania House of Representatives from 1979 to 1982. Lewis was born in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania.
She was married to Andrew L. Lewis Jr..
Lewis died on December 7, 2020, in Lansdale, Pennsylvania at age 89.
